1_1FHZZ13tmi64crAx9n8qJQkkEkCcKguaei.body:
> [linuxer](#comment_2_1FHZZ13tmi64crAx9n8qJQkkEkCcKguaei): Good idea, I've made option to sort distributions by popularity or by name.

What about measuring how popular they are among ZeroNet users and (maybe also) adding an order based on that?

(If you know no better way to measure their popularity on ZeroNet, you can create a poll for that on the http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroPolls.bit/ Zite. If you chose this way of measuring, consider making it 'hidden' and only accessible from your Zite.)

1_1QAKp4SUFSkGdqsgEH47rWRJkAMLf5YH4b.body:
Nice collection but it needs some update.

For example, http://www.sci-hub.org/ is down for a while. 
The link should be replaced with http://sci-hub.cc/ (that mirror is still working). 
FYI there is also an onion layer to sci-hub: http://scihub22266oqcxt.onion/
